title: Luxury Condo Grade 2 bed with Private Chef / Private Bar! Wash Park
neighborhood: Wash Park, Cherry Creek, Downtown, Denver
posting_body: ['Welcome Home!', 'Call / Text QUICK for showings', 'One bedroom One bathroom ready for immediate move in!', '14th floor!', 'This property offers the best views, the best service and the best amenities, in the best location in Denver.', 'This luxurious property is ideally located blocks from Washington Park, five minutes to Cherry Creek and ten minutes from the heart of Downtown Denver.', 'Choose this luxury one bedroom.', 'Enjoy the serenity of high rise living and first class amenities, five minutes from everywhere you want to be.', 'Private Chef!', 'Rentable luxury display
